backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report structure containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend React files describing components, effects, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the app root and main TypeScript bundle with font preconnects.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing screen transitions, animated gradients, moving NO button behavior, and triggering confetti/fireworks effects.
frontend/src/components/effects/Confetti: Canvas component rendering falling animated confetti particles with gravity and rotation.
frontend/src/components/effects/Firework: Canvas component generating randomized fireworks that launch, explode into particles, and fade out over time.
frontend/src/components/WarningGate.tsx: Warning screen component showing alerts, risks, and a shareable link with copy functionality before continuing.
frontend/src/config/deploymentDomain.ts: Defines deployment domain and generates a full deployment URL depending on environment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposes login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/hooks/useShareLink.ts: Creates a shareable URL and provides clipboard copy logic with simple success/error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, custom animations, and theme variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and pending feature requests.
